name: GravRabbit
description:
Can you recover all the music notes the fastest? Mess with gravity, dodge lasers, and push boxes to solve puzzles and find out!

NEW - Added Windows build, with haptic feedback and some minor fixes!

Controls

Alternate Keyboard and Gamepad controls are now supported!

Keyboard

  • A/D or Left/Right to Move
  • Space or Z to Jump
  • W or Up to Interact
  • Q/E or X/C to ???

Gamepad

  • Left Stick or D-Pad to Move
  • A/Cross to Jump
  • X/Square to Interact
  • LB/RB or L1/R1 to ???

Credits

  • Title Font - https://fontenddev.com/fonts/double-homicide/
  • Other Font - Upheaval Created by Brian Kent
  • Music - BlackedIRL - MEMORY CORE - Et Cor Machina PLUS
  • Palette - EULBINK by Inkpendude
  • Sounds - MajorPest + JFXR
  • Art - MajorPest + Aseprite
  • Code/Design - MajorPest + Rider
  • QA - Story
